text: The BMT Broadway Line is a line of the New York City Subway. There are four services, and about 748,900 people ride on them every day. Services using this line are colored sunflower yellow. ==Services== * N: This is the Broadway Express, operating from Ditmars Blvd to 86 Street Due Flood Work Between Coney Island and 86 Street. * Q: This is the Broadway Express, which currently operates from 96th Street- 2nd Avenue to Coney Island-Stillwell Avenue at all times. * R: This is a local service, operating from 71st Avenue to 95th Street (but only from Whitehall Street-South Ferry at late nights). * W: This train is a local service, operating from Astoria-Ditmars Boulevard in Queens to Whitehall Street-South Ferry in Manhattan. The W runs on weekdays from 6:00 a.m to 11:30 p.m
title: BMT Broadway Line
